dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Evaluates a model in a raster format and delivers results of the tests.

Delivers information about:

  • Accuracy

  • Precision

  • Recall

  • Area under the courve

  • Proportion of prospective area

  • Area Under the Curve

  • Confusion Matrix

Saves plots with:

  • ROC curve

  • Precision-Recall curve

  • Success Curve
